WorkItem.ClosedComment: Reset your Item Cache, the default cache was updated to include the same info with new stat names.
WorkItem.Description:
This is on rawr 4.1.3.0, from the ej site
 
This is for a mage, but I haven't checked other toons to see if it is a generic problem.
 
In 4.0.20 (I think) burning shadowspirit diamonds used to be the highest rated meta.
Now the Ember Shadowspirit is.
 
The burning only lists the 54 int as the bonus, there is no
additional bonus (like crit dmg).
 
I tried editing the item to manually add 3% increased crit dmg, and it showed it greyed out,
as an unused stat, so I may have messed that part up.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Burning Shadowspirit Meta is Ignoring Increased Crit Damage

Comments.Message: Try increase '% Spell Crit Damage' instead of '% Crit Damage'
Thanks Jothay; changing %crit to %spell crit restored burning to the 'best' gem.  So that leaves the question of why the stats disappeared in the first place.
